items.text:
You reach the lip of the Plummet, and you and Dace stare over the
sheer drop. She takes a deep breath, and starts to pace back and
forth along the edge. You hear her repeating, quietly “I am light as a
feather, rising to the sun,” over and over.

You start to say something about there being a better way to test this,
but suddenly Dace hurls herself over the cliff! You dash to the edge
to see her falling, then slowing, then gracefully gliding at the pace of
a brisk walk. As she reaches the base of the Plummet, she stops, rises
back up, then settles softly to the ground.
You can hear her whoop of victory echoing off the rocks.
Gain the Light as a Feather reward card. Discard Dace. Return
